function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Contagious diseases transmission within the built environment due to increased use of IoT and interconnected devices.","Impact":"Increased spread of contagious diseases within healthcare facilities and other built environments.","Mitigation":"Implementation of strict hygiene protocols, use of antimicrobial materials, and regular disinfection of IoT devices and equipment.","Technologies":"IoT sensors for monitoring hygiene, UV-C disinfection technology, antimicrobial coatings for surfaces and devices.","People":"Patients, healthcare workers, visitors, and other occupants of healthcare facilities and built environments.","Owner":"Healthcare facility management, building owners, and public health authorities."}]}
